snippet: The Office of Naval Intelligence has refined some of the most creative techniques that have been used to find sunken ships, spent warheads and downed pilots.
abstract: Uncertainties surrounding Malaysia Airlines Flight 370's disappearance are enormous, but Navy strategists have been unraveling lost-at-sea mysteries as far back as World War II; Office of Naval Intelligence has refined some of most creative techniques that have been used to find sunken ships, spent warheads and downed pilots; they will come into play if Navy is asked to help in search for Malaysia Airlines jet.
lead_paragraph: The Office of Naval Intelligence has refined some of the most creative techniques that have been used to find sunken ships, spent warheads and downed pilots.

headline.main: U.S. Navy Strategists Have a Long History of Finding the Lost
headline.print_headline: U.S. Navy Strategists Have a Long History of Finding the Lost
